scripts.install: npm run client -- install --no-audit && npm run evm -- install --no-audit
scripts.audit: npm run client -- audit --production && npm run evm -- audit --production
scripts.test: npm run evm:test && npm run client:test && npm run audit
scripts.build: npm run evm:build && npm run client:build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run evm:node" "npm run evm:deploy -- --network localhost && npm run client:dev"
